items.sentence: Tom was surprised by what he found in the box.
Do you think we'll ever make money doing this?
Why do I always need to do everything for you?
If I were you, I'd do the same thing Tom does.
Tom doesn't really care what Mary wants to do.
Let's not do anything that we'll regret later.
Why is it so important for you to talk to Tom?
Tom was talking to Mary about his experiences.
I need you to help me take care of Tom's kids.
I keep calling, but I can't get a hold of Tom.
